Sentencas: In recent years, doped ceria is an established and promising candidate as solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cell (IT-SOFC).
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions

Sentencas: In this investigation, synthesis and characterizations of nano-crystalline Gd doped ceria, (Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2, where x = 0-0.3), prepared using glycine-nitrate process (GNP) has been presented.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions

Sentencas: Evolution of structural and morphological properties of nano-powders as a function of heat treatment has also been studied.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions

Sentencas: The prepared samples were characterized using TG-DTA, FT-IR, Raman spectroscopy, XRD, SEM, etc.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions

Sentencas: In addition, the effect of Gd content over the micro-structural properties of nano-crystalline Gd doped ceria was investigated.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions

Sentencas: Raman analysis of calcined powders confirms the formation of the solid solution of Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 instead of mixture of CeO2 and Gd2O3.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions

Sentencas: The solid solutions obeyed Vegard's rule very well.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions

Sentencas: Grain growth of sintered samples was observed to hinder with an increase in Gd content.
Titulo: Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions
Synthesis and characterization of nano-crystalline Ce1-xGdxO2-x/2 (x=0-0.30) solid solutions
